modMetaData.name: Spidercamp's Decorative Plants
modMetaData.author: Spidercamp
modMetaData.description:
A collection of decorative plants.
Included Plants White Hydrangea Blue Hydrangea Pink Hydrangea Decorative Sunflower Lavender Flowering Pincushion Cactus Flowering Saguaro Cactus Bonsai Pine Bonsai Poplar Bonsai Oak Bonsai Birch Bonsai Cecropia
[h1]Features[/h1] Bonsai trees can only be grown in pots and cannot be harvested for wood. They exist only to be admired. Flowers and cacti can be grown in the ground or in pots.
More plants suggestions welcome.
